Detailed Description

The system manager singleton.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ckSysMgr::SysFlag

The system flags.

Enumerator:
FLAG_FULLSCREEN_START  Starts with full screen mode.

FLAG_VARIABLE_SIZE  Enables resize the window.

FLAG_DISABLE_SHADER  Disables programmable shader.

enum ckSysMgr::FileMode

The file modes.

Enumerator:
FILE_MODE_READ  Read-only.

FILE_MODE_WRITE  Read and write.
